thread.title: George Michael’s funeral postponed to at least March so further tests can be carried out on his body, as Fadi’s nephew hits out over funeral ban
thread.title_full: George Michael’s funeral postponed to at least March so further tests can be carried out on his body, as Fadi’s nephew hits out over funeral ban

author: rpinnington
title: George Michael’s funeral postponed to at least March so further tests can be carried out on his body, as Fadi’s nephew hits out over funeral ban
text:
TV Magazine DRUG TEST HOLD-UP George Michael’s funeral postponed to at least March so further tests can be carried out on his body, as Fadi’s nephew hits out over funeral ban 
George's lover Fad Fawaz's nephew said not saying goodbye to the star will 'devastate' Fadi, while the family wonder what is taking the coroner so long By MIKE HAMILTON and LAURA ARMSTRONG 18th February 2017, 10:27 pm
